```{r}
f <- function(x, y){
  return(0)
}
f_x <- function(x,y){
  return(-2*x -2*x*y^2 -2*y +2)
}
f_y <- function(x,y){
  return(-2*x^2*y-2*x)
}
f_xy <- function(x,y){
  return(-4*x*y-2)
}
f_xx <- function(x,y){
  return(-2 -2*y^2)
}
f_yy <- function(x,y){
  return(-2*x^2)
}
get_hessian_mat <- function(x,y){
  hess <- matrix(c(f_xx(x,y), f_xy(x,y), f_xy(x,y), f_yy(x,y)), ncol=2)
  return(hess)
}

get_hessian_mat(0,0)
```
